item.title: How to Upgrade a Gen2 AC Infinity AirTap T4 or T6 ESP32 Module to Work in a Gen3 Vent
item.author: team@silocitylabs.com (Silo City Labs)
item.description: Owners of the AC Infinity AirTap T4/T6 may be looking for a way to retrofit their older Gen2 ESP32 module so it can operate inside the newer Gen3 AirTap vent. The Gen3 design uses a different mounting layout and sensor position, which means the original Gen2 hardware does not fit or function without modification. To solve this, we created a simple upgrade path that lets you reuse your Gen2 module with full Gen3 compatibility.
